summary: 该接口用于查看DBS任务错误码信息。

schema.description:
错误信息语言，取值如下：

- **en**：英文（默认值）
- **cn**：中文
用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。

ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

JobId.description: 全量备份或者恢复任务ID。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "HttpStatusCode": 200,
  "RequestId": "1FC2F86D-AFF4-4ED9-BB25-ADDE196CB2B5",
  "ErrCode": "Param.NotFound",
  "Success": true,
  "ErrMessage": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid.     ",
  "Item": {
    "JobState": "init",
    "ErrorMessage": "Describe preCheck progress failed.",
    "ErrorCode": "failed",
    "JobId": "r1iv62ud****",
    "JobType": "testId",
    "Language": "en"
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeJobErrorCodeReponse>
<Item>
    <Language>en</Language>
    <JobId>tooi0XXXX</JobId>
</Item>
<RequestId>1FC2F86D-AFF4-4ED9-BB25-ADDE196CB2B5</RequestId>
<HttpStatusCode>200</HttpStatusCode>
<Success>true</Success>
</DescribeJobErrorCodeReponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看任务错误码信息
